content: In the engineered calm of Stenograd, where daily life is guided by the all-seeing Behavioral Compliance Index, the sudden death of Marek Halden—the city’s supposed architect of order—shakes everything. But even greater tremors follow when Sven Halek, seeking truth over stability, reveals that “Halden” never existed at all, but was a mask for the Council’s secret collusion. News spreads like wildfire, igniting outrage and suspicion; alliances crumble as citizens turn on one another, unsure who to trust. Neighborhoods fracture into tribunals and accusations, demands for true justice running rampant while the dream of collective self-rule unravels. What once looked like perfect order dissolves into leaderless confusion, as the city faces the raw consequences of its own engineered deception.
